Layout.MetaDescription: Create, share, post, and find the strongest team with CR Tactics Builder. Be the last one standing in the arena!
Layout.Title: CR Merge Tactics Team Builder | Clash Royale

ResetPassword.subject: Reset your password
ResetPassword.title: Reset your password
ResetPassword.message: We received a request to reset the password for your account.
ResetPassword.ignoreMessage: If you didn't request to reset your password, you can safely ignore this email. Someone else might have typed your email address by mistake.

AccountDeletion.subject: Confirm Account Deletion
AccountDeletion.title: Account Deletion Request
AccountDeletion.message: We received a request to delete your account. This action cannot be undone and will permanently delete all your data.
AccountDeletion.ignoreMessage: If you didn't request to delete your account, you can safely ignore this email. Please change your password and contact support if you believe your account has been compromised.

SignInOTP.subject: Your login OTP code
SignInOTP.title: Sign in to Turboitem
SignInOTP.message: You requested to sign in to Turboitem. Your one-time code is:
SignInOTP.expiresIn: This code will expire in 5 minutes.
SignInOTP.ignoreMessage: If you didn't request this code, please ignore this message.

EmailVerification.subject: Verify your email address
EmailVerification.title: Verify your email address
EmailVerification.message: We need to verify your email address {email} before you can access your account. Enter the code below in your open browser window.
EmailVerification.expiresIn: This code will expire in 5 minutes.
EmailVerification.ignoreMessage: If you didn't sign up for Turboitem, you can safely ignore this email. Someone else might have typed your email address by mistake.

EmailChange.subject: Verify your new email address
EmailChange.title: Verify your new email address
EmailChange.message: We received a request to change your email address to {email}. Click the button below to verify this new email address.
EmailChange.ignoreMessage: If you didn't request to change your email address, you can safely ignore this email. Please change your password and contact support if you believe your account has been compromised.

AuthLocalization.byContinuingYouAgree: By continuing, you agree to the
AuthLocalization.protectedByRecaptcha: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA.
AuthLocalization.sessionNotFresh: Your session is not fresh. Please sign in again.
AuthLocalization.verifyYourEmailDescription: Please verify your email address. Check your inbox for the verification email. If you haven't received the email, click the button below to resend.
AuthLocalization.usernameDescription: Enter the username you want to use to log in.
AuthLocalization.twoFactorTotpLabel: Scan the QR Code with your Authenticator
AuthLocalization.twoFactorEnableInstructions: Please enter your password to enable 2FA
AuthLocalization.twoFactorDisableInstructions: Please enter your password to disable 2FA.
AuthLocalization.twoFactorCardDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
AuthLocalization.twoFactorDescription: Please enter your one-time password to continue
AuthLocalization.setPasswordDescription: Click the button below to receive an email to set up a password for your account.
AuthLocalization.sessionsDescription: Manage your active sessions and revoke access.
AuthLocalization.signUpEmail: Check your email for the verification link.
AuthLocalization.signUpDescription: Enter your information to create an account
AuthLocalization.signInUsernameDescription: Enter your username or email below to login to your account
AuthLocalization.signInDescription: Enter your email below to login to your account
AuthLocalization.deleteApiKeyConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this API key?
AuthLocalization.recoverAccountDescription: Please enter a backup code to access your account
AuthLocalization.providersDescription: Connect your account with a third-party service.
AuthLocalization.apiKeyCreatedDescription: Please copy your API key and store it in a safe place. For security reasons we cannot show it again.
AuthLocalization.createApiKeyDescription: Enter a unique name for your API key to differentiate it from other keys.
AuthLocalization.apiKeysInstructions: Generate API keys to access your account programmatically.
AuthLocalization.apiKeysDescription: Manage your API keys for secure access.
AuthLocalization.passkeysInstructions: Securely access your account without a password.
AuthLocalization.passkeysDescription: Manage your passkeys for secure access.
AuthLocalization.nameDescription: Please enter your full name, or a display name.
AuthLocalization.name: Name
AuthLocalization.emailOTPVerificationSent: Please check your email for the verification code.
AuthLocalization.emailOTPDescription: Enter your email to receive a code
AuthLocalization.magicLinkEmail: Check your email for the magic link
AuthLocalization.magicLinkDescription: Enter your email to receive a magic link
AuthLocalization.forgotPasswordEmail: Check your email for the password reset link.
AuthLocalization.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email to reset your password
AuthLocalization.emailVerification: Please check your email for the verification link.
AuthLocalization.emailVerifyChange: Please check your email to verify the change.
AuthLocalization.emailInstructions: Please enter a valid email address.
AuthLocalization.emailDescription: Enter the email address you want to use to log in.
AuthLocalization.disabledCredentialsDescription: Choose a provider to login to your account
AuthLocalization.deleteAccountNotFresh: You must be recently logged in to delete your account.
AuthLocalization.deleteAccountVerify: Please check your email to verify the deletion of your account.
AuthLocalization.deleteAccountInstructions: Please confirm the deletion of your account. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
AuthLocalization.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently remove your account and all of its contents. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
AuthLocalization.changePasswordDescription: Enter your current password and a new password.
AuthLocalization.backupCodePlaceholder: Enter one of your backup codes. Once used, each code can only be used once and will be invalidated after use.
AuthLocalization.backupCodesDescription: Save these backup codes in a secure place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your two-factor authentication method.
AuthLocalization.avatarInstructions: An avatar is optional but strongly recommended.
AuthLocalization.avatarDescription: Click on the avatar to upload a custom one from your files.
AuthLocalization.accountsInstructions: Sign in to an additional account.
AuthLocalization.accountsDescription: Manage your currently signed in accounts.

ResetDialog.Description: This will remove all troops from the board and reset your elixir count. Your synergies and ruler selection will be cleared.
ResetDialog.Title: Reset Game Board?

SaveBuildDialog.DescriptionPlaceholder: Describe your strategy, combos, or tips for playing this build...
SaveBuildDialog.PublishDescription: Make this build visible to everyone
SaveBuildDialog.DraftDescription: Save as draft, only visible to you
SaveBuildDialog.TroopsRequired: Please add at least one troop to the board
